context.title: Create Maven-based App Engine Standard Project
context.description: Create a new Maven-based Eclipse project that can be deployed to the App Engine standard environment. Group ID: The Maven Group ID. Should be an alphanumeric path separated by periods. Artifact ID: The Maven Artifact ID. Should be an alphanumeric name separated by dashes. Libraries to add to build path: Adds useful libraries for the App Engine standard environment for your project build path.

context.title: Select Maven Archetype
context.description: Choose one of the Maven archetypes pre-configured for the App Engine standard environment.
